alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 1:35PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect east central Aroostook County... At 134 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Woodland to near Island Falls...and moving northeast AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Houlton, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Hodgdon, Easton, Woodland, Island Falls, Bridgewater, Smyrna, Dudley Township, Loring, Smyrna Mills, Scopan, Littleton and Linneus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 285 and 304. US Highway 1 between Hodgdon and Caribou. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
